alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 17 at 2:59AM PDT until June 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert of Northern San Bernardino County. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 11 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Pockets of blowing dust could impact travel on US-395 and Interstate 15.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Western Mojave Desert
